trans-unit.source: Provides type conversion for the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> class.

This converter exists primarily so that the existing `xml:lang` settings in an XML file do not interfere with the parsing of attributes that use <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> as their underlying type.
trans-unit.target: Służy on głównie istnieje, aby istniejące `xml:lang` ustawienia w pliku XML nie zakłóca analizowania atrybuty, które używają <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>jak nazwa ich typu podstawowego.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguageConverter"></xref> class.
Returns whether this converter can convert an object of one type to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> type supported by this converter.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca czy ten konwerter można przekonwertować obiektu typu do <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> typ obsługiwany przez tego konwertera.

trans-unit.source: This method only returns `true` for `sourceType` of <xref:System.String>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A type that represents the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Typ, który reprezentuje typ, który ma zostać przekonwertowany z.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli ten konwerter można dokonać konwersji; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca czy ten konwerter można przekonwertować obiektu określonego typu.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` for `destinationType` of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> or `destinationType` of <xref:System.String>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The type you want to convert to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli ten konwerter można dokonać konwersji; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string value to the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> type supported by this converter.
trans-unit.target: Konwertuje wartość określonego ciągu na <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> typ obsługiwany przez tego konwertera.

trans-unit.source: The `source` value must be a string, otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `source` Wartość musi być ciągiem, w przeciwnym razie jest zwracany wyjątek.

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the return value is a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli konwersja zakończy się pomyślnie, zwracana wartość jest <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A> for additional exception information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The string to convert.
An object that represents the converted value.
Conversion could not be performed.
Converts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Konwertuje określony <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> do określonego typu.

trans-unit.source: For `destinationType` <xref:System.String>, this method returns the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> value of the provided <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać `destinationType` <xref:System.String>, ta metoda zwraca <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A>wartość podana <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For `destinationType` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> this method returns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> instance that is useful for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać `destinationType` <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>Ta metoda zwraca <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>wystąpienia, które są przydatne do serializacji.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Other `destinationType` inputs throw exceptions.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
This is expected to be type <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
A type that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Typ, który reprezentuje typ, który chcesz przekonwertować.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the converted value.
Conversion could not be performed.
destinationType is .
